attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
now scotland has it's own parliament, now maybe is the right time for more powers.
maybe for example, power to legislate on 
imigration and defence

rejection.details: Your title (currently 'Alan Stitt') should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
